translations.chinese: 沛公還之沛，怨雍齒與豐子弟畔之。
translations.english: Pei Gong returned to Pei, resentful that Yong Chi and the young men of Feng had rebelled against him.

translations.chinese: 正月，張耳等立趙後趙歇為趙王。
translations.english: In the first month, Zhang Er and others established Zhao's former king Zhao Xie as King of Zhao.

translations.chinese: 東陽甯君、秦嘉立景駒為楚王，在留。
translations.english: The Lord of Dongyang Ning and Qin Jia established Jing Ju as King of Chu, stationed at Liu.

translations.chinese: 沛公往從之，道得張良，遂與俱 見景駒，請兵以攻豐。
translations.english: Pei Gong went to join him, met Zhang Liang along the way, and together they went to see Jing Ju, requesting troops to attack Feng.

translations.chinese: 時章邯從陳，別將司馬镛將兵北定楚地，屠相，至碭。
translations.english: At this time, Zhang Han was pursuing Chen, while his deputy general Sima Yiou led troops north to pacify Chu territory, massacring Xiang and reaching Dang.
